testcase.classname: Verify whether user is able to add a New Product
testcase.name: Login and click on Product Add Tab to go to Add page
testcase.system-out: Given navigate_to_application_url...........................................passed When login_to_application_with_valid_credentials............................passed Then click_on_ProductAdd_Button.............................................passed And verify the product add fields...........................................passed And verify if ProductAdd button is disabled.................................passed And input all mandatory fields..............................................passed Then verify Product Add button is enabled...................................passed And verify duplicate product cannot be created..............................passed Then create a new valid product.............................................passed

testcase.classname: Availability of newly added product in new bug page package dropdown
testcase.name: verification of newly added product in package dropdown
testcase.system-out: Given user present in new bug page..........................................passed When click on package dropdown..............................................passed Then verify presence of newly added product.................................passed
